bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Prospect Park and Flatbush Railroad was organized in 1876 and merged with the Coney Island Railroad in 1891. The Grand Street, Prospect Park and Flatbush Railroad was organized in 1870 and foreclosed in 1887. Both companies were controlled by Loftis Wood at the time of the lease agreement.
